    public class RemoteBoardView
extends cn.robotpen.core.views.WhiteBoardView
implements cn.robotpen.core.module.TrailsManageModule.OnReportTrailsListener
    支持远端操作的画布视图 Created by Xiaoz on 16/9/27.

        请求写入权限
